text: David Dominick DeLuise (born November 11, 1971) is an American actor and TV director. He is known for his starring roles on 3rd Rock From The Sun (1996-2001), Jesse (1998-1999), Megas XLR, and Wizards of Waverly Place. He also starred in the movies Terror Tract (2000), and Jam (2006). His parents were actors Dom DeLuise and Carol Arthur.David DeLuise Biography (1971â€“). Filmreference.com. Retrieved on 2012-01-28.
